"PIXI.BaseTexture"

Static Methods

fromCanvas(canvas : js.html.CanvasElement, ?scaleMode : Int) : BaseTexture

parameters
canvas {Canvas} The canvas element source of the texture
scaleMode {Int} See {{#crossLink "PIXI/scaleModes:property"}}scaleModes{{/crossLink}} for possible values
returns
BaseTexture
Helper function that creates a base texture from the given canvas element.

fromImage(imageUrl : String, ?crossorigin : Bool, ?scaleMode : Int) : BaseTexture

parameters
imageUrl {String} The image url of the texture
[crossorigin=(auto)] {Bool} Should use anonymouse CORS? Defaults to true if the URL is not a data-URI.
[scaleMode=scaleModes.DEFAULT] {Int} See {@link scaleModes} for possible values
returns
BaseTexture
Helper function that creates a base texture from the given image url. If the image is not in the base texture cache it will be created and loaded.

Constructor

new(source : js.html.ImageElement, ?scaleMode : Int, ?resolution : Float)
parameters
source {Image|Canvas} the source object of the texture.
[scaleMode=scaleModes.DEFAULT] {number} See {@link SCALE_MODES} for possible values
resolution {number} the resolution of the texture for devices with different pixel ratios
A texture stores the information that represents an image. All textures have a base texture.

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

hasLoaded : Bool

Set to true once the base texture has successfully loaded. This is never true if the underlying source fails to load or has no texture data.

height : Float

The height of the base texture set when the image has loaded

imageUrl : String

isLoading : Bool

Set to true if the source is currently loading. If an Image source is loading the 'loaded' or 'error' event will be dispatched when the operation ends. An underyling source that is immediately-available bypasses loading entirely.

mipmap : Bool

Set this to true if a mipmap of this texture needs to be generated. This value needs to be set before the texture is used Also the texture must be a power of two size to work

premultipliedAlpha : Bool

Controls if RGB channels should be pre-multiplied by Alpha (WebGL only)

resolution : Float

The Resolution of the texture.

scaleMode : Int

The scale mode to apply when scaling this texture

source : Dynamic

The image source that is used to create the texture.

width : Float

The width of the base texture set when the image has loaded

{Mixed} context The context of the function.

destroy() : Void

Destroys this base texture

dispose() : Void

Frees the texture from WebGL memory without destroying this texture object. This means you can still use the texture later which will upload it to GPU memory again.

loadSource(source : String) : Void

parameters
source {Image|Canvas} the source object of the texture.
Load a source. If the source is not-immediately-available, such as an image that needs to be downloaded, then the 'loaded' or 'error' event will be dispatched in the future and `hasLoaded` will remain false after this call. The logic state after calling `loadSource` directly or indirectly (eg. `fromImage`, `new BaseTexture`) is: if (texture.hasLoaded) { // texture ready for use } else if (texture.isLoading) { // listen to 'loaded' and/or 'error' events on texture } else { // not loading, not going to load UNLESS the source is reloaded // (it may still make sense to listen to the events) }

off(event : String, fn : EventTarget -> Void, ?once : Bool) : Void

update() : Void

Updates the texture on all the webgl renderers.

updateSourceImage(newSrc : String) : Void

parameters
newSrc {String} the path of the image
Changes the source image of the texture. The original source must be an Image element.
